body:
This will create a `once_flag` per .cpp file that includes this header. You might be able to mark it `extern` and define it in a `.cpp` file.

I think the function should be marked `inline` since it's defined in the header.
body_html:
This will create a once_flag per .cpp file that includes this header. You might be able to mark it extern and define it in a .cpp file.

I think the function should be marked inline since it's defined in the header.
body_text:
This will create a once_flag per .cpp file that includes this header. You might be able to mark it extern and define it in a .cpp file.
I think the function should be marked inline since it's defined in the header.
